name: HousingInstabilityScreeningAssessmentsAnswers
title: Housing Instability Screening Assessments Answers
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents answers to screening assessment questions for Housing Instability as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: This set of values may be used to represent screening assessment answers in observations, questionnaires, and questionnaire responses for this SDOH domain (e.g., for the SDOHCC Observation Screening Response profile in the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for answers to SDOH screening assessment questions as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes the answers to questions not selected by the Gravity Project from SDOH screening assessments.)

concept.display: I choose not to answer this question
I have a steady place to live
I have a place to live today, but I am worried about losing it in the future

I do not have a steady place to live (I am temporarily staying with others, in a hotel, in a shelter, living outside on the street, on a beach, in a car, abandoned building, bus or train station, or in a park)
